CapPyCurl Documentation¶

RedCurl¶

class RedCurl.RedCurl(cappage, token='')[source]¶

RedCurl -

A class for talking to redcap with pycurl

deltoken()[source]¶

Remove the token from locals

fieldnames(style='json', token='')[source]¶

fieldnames - get fieldnames from metadata

Parameters:
  • style – format to return from redcap, defaults to json
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

redcap project metadata
fullpull(delim=', ', recno='', token='')[source]¶

fullpull - pull all fields for specified records

Parameters:
  • delim – how to output fields are to be separated
  • recno – records to pull, defaults to all records
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

all fields for the records specified
gettoken()[source]¶
Returns:API token
metagrab(style='json', token='')[source]¶

metagrab - grab project metadata

Parameters:
  • style – format to return from redcap, defaults to json
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

redcap project metadata
pullform(recno, forms, style='json', token='')[source]¶

pullform - pull a Redcap form for a record

Parameters:
  • recno – record(s) to query
  • forms – form(s) to pull
  • style – format to return from redcap, defaults to json
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

form for the record(s) you asked for
pullrec(recno, style='json', fields=None, token='')[source]¶

pullrec - pull Redcap records

Parameters:
  • recno – record(s) to query
  • style – format to return from redcap, defaults to json
  • fields – field(s) to pull, defaults to all
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

Fields from the list of records
pushfile(recno, fieldname, localname, rcname, pid=None, token='')[source]¶

pushfile - upload a file

Parameters:
  • recno – record to push data to N.B. This is currently implemented for a single record!
  • fieldname – field to upload the file to
  • localname – full path to file that is to be uploaded
  • rcname – name of the file as it should appear on redcap
  • pid – project id, only necessary if the redcap project is longitudinal
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
pushrec(recno, token='', **kwargs)[source]¶

pushrec - push Redcap record

Parameters:
  • recno – record to push data to N.B. This is currently implemented for a single record!
  • kwargs – dictionary whose keys are fieldnames and values are the data to upload to said fields
  • token – API token (if not provided earlier)
Returns:

server response

Param:API token
